[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@here/harp-map-controls](./harp-map-controls.md) &gt; [CameraRotationAnimationOptions](./harp-map-controls.camerarotationanimationoptions.md)

## CameraRotationAnimationOptions interface

Options for a camera animation.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface CameraRotationAnimationOptions 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [axis](./harp-map-controls.camerarotationanimationoptions.axis.md) | THREE.Vector3 | Fixed rotation axis of camera. Defaults to <code>[0,0,1]</code> for z-axis. |
|  [duration](./harp-map-controls.camerarotationanimationoptions.duration.md) | number | Duration of a whole animation in milliseconds. Defaults to <code>10</code> seconds. |
|  [easing](./harp-map-controls.camerarotationanimationoptions.easing.md) | [EasingFunction](./harp-map-controls.easingfunction.md) \| ((k: number) =&gt; number) | Easing function that control acceleration. Defaults to \[\[EasingFunction.Linear\]\]. |
|  [endAngle](./harp-map-controls.camerarotationanimationoptions.endangle.md) | number | End angle. May be greater than 360 in case more than one rotation is required. |
|  [repeat](./harp-map-controls.camerarotationanimationoptions.repeat.md) | number | Number of times the animation should be repeated. Defaults to <code>0</code>. |
|  [startAngle](./harp-map-controls.camerarotationanimationoptions.startangle.md) | number | Start angle in degrees. Defaults to 0. |
